sqlMap.select: SELECT T.MONTH_ID, T.FIRST_THREE, T.LAST_THREE, ROUND(T1.KPI_05*100, 2) KPI_05, ROUND((T1.KPI_05-T1.KPI_06) * 100, 2) KPI_00 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_1_2 T, CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_1_1 T1 WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.MONTH_ID = T1.MONTH_ID AND T1.ORG_ID = 'root'

SELECT A.LEVEL_NAME, T.ORG_ID, T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_1_1 T LEFT JOIN HN_DMCODE.DIM_NODE_ID_N_STATIC_V A ON T.ORG_ID = A.LEVEL_ID WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# ORDER BY T.ORG_ID

SELECT A.LEVEL_NAME, T.ORG_ID, ROUND(T.KPI_01 * 100, 2) KPI_01, ROUND(T.KPI_03 * 100, 2) KPI_03 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_1_1 T LEFT JOIN HN_DMCODE.DIM_NODE_ID_N_STATIC_V A ON T.ORG_ID = A.LEVEL_ID WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.PARENT_ORG_ID = 'root' ORDER BY T.ORG_ID

SELECT A.LEVEL_NAME, T.ORG_ID, ROUND(T.KPI_02 * 100, 2) KPI_02, ROUND((T.KPI_02 - T.KPI_06) * 100, 2) KPI FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_1_1 T LEFT JOIN HN_DMCODE.DIM_NODE_ID_N_STATIC_V A ON T.ORG_ID = A.LEVEL_ID WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = #orgId#

SELECT T.MONTH_ID, A.AREA_NO, A.AREA_DESC, T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_2_1 T, HN_DMCODE.DMCODE_AREA_CW_VIEW A WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = A.AREA_NO ORDER BY A.SELECT_ORD

SELECT T.MONTH_ID, A.AREA_DESC, TO_CHAR(T.KPI_01*100,'9999999990.99') AS KPI_01, TO_CHAR(T.KPI_02*100,'9999999990.99') AS KPI_02, TO_CHAR(T.KPI_03*100,'9999999990.99') AS KPI_03 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_2_1 T, HN_DMCODE.DMCODE_AREA_CW_VIEW A WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = A.AREA_NO AND T.PARENT_ORG_ID = 'root'
SELECT T.MONTH_ID, TO_CHAR(T.KPI_05*100,'9999999990.99') AS KPI_05, TO_CHAR(T.KPI_03,'9999999990.99') AS KPI_03 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_2_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = 'root'

SELECT T.MONTH_ID, A.AREA_DESC, TO_CHAR(T.KPI_01,'9999999990.99') AS KPI_01, TO_CHAR(T.KPI_03,'9999999990.99') AS KPI_03, TO_CHAR(T.KPI_06,'9999999990.99') AS KPI_06 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_2_1 T, HN_DMCODE.DMCODE_AREA_CW_VIEW A WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = A.AREA_NO AND T.ORG_ID = #areaNo#
SELECT T.MONTH_ID, T.FIRST_THREE, T.LAST_THREE FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_2_2 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId#
SELECT A.AREA_DESC,A.AREA_NO, T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02 FROM ( SELECT * FROM HN_DMCODE.DMCODE_AREA_CW_VIEW) A, (SELECT * FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_3_1 T WHERE MONTH_ID = #monthId# )T WHERE A.AREA_NO=T.ORG_ID

SELECT A.MONTH_ID,B.KPI_01 FROM HN_DMCODE.CODE_MONTH A, (SELECT SUBSTR(T.MONTH_ID, 5) MONTH_ID,KPI_01 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_TZYX_3_1 T WHERE MONTH_ID LIKE '$year$%' and ORG_ID = #areaNo# ) B WHERE A.MONTH_ID = B.MONTH_ID(+) ORDER BY A.MONTH_ID
